verses.verse: Maschil <S%H4905><s%> of <S%H623>Asaph.<s%> Give <S%H238>ear,<s%> O my <S%H5971>people,<s%> to my <S%H8451>law:<s%> <S%H5186>incline<s%> your <S%H241>ears<s%> to the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
I will <S%H6605>open<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in a <S%H4912>parable:<s%> I will <S%H5042>utter<s%> dark <S%H2420>sayings<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> old: <S%H6924><s%>
Which <S%H834><s%> we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> and <S%H3045>known,<s%> and our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H5608>told<s%> us.

We will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3582>hide<s%> them from their <S%H4480>children,<s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5608>showing<s%> to the <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H314>come<s%> the <S%H8416>praises<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and his <S%H5807>strength,<s%> and his wonderful <S%H6381>works<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H6213>done.<s%>

For he <S%H6965>established<s%> a <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H7760>appointed<s%> a <S%H8451>law<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> that they should make them <S%H3045>known<s%> to their children: <S%H1121><s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> the <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H314>come<s%> might <S%H3045>know<s%> them, even the <S%H1121>children<s%> which should be <S%H3205>born;<s%> who should <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H5608>declare<s%> them to their children: <S%H1121><s%>

That they might <S%H7760>set<s%> their <S%H3689>hope<s%> in <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H4611>works<s%> of <S%H410>God,<s%> but <S%H5341>keep<s%> his commandments: <S%H4687><s%>

And might <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> as their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> a <S%H5637>stubborn<s%> and <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H1755>generation;<s%> a <S%H1755>generation<s%> that set not their heart <S%H3559>aright,<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3820><s%> and whose <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H539>steadfast<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> being <S%H5401>armed,<s%> and <S%H7411>carrying<s%> <S%H7198>bows,<s%> turned <S%H2015>back<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7128>battle.<s%>
They <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in his <S%H8451>law;<s%>
And <S%H7911>forgot<s%> his <S%H5949>works,<s%> and his <S%H6381>wonders<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he had <S%H7200>showed<s%> them.
Marvelous <S%H6382>things<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> he in the <S%H5048>sight<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6814>Zoan.<s%>
He <S%H1234>divided<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and caused them to pass <S%H5674>through;<s%> and he made the <S%H4325>waters<s%> to <S%H5324>stand<s%> <S%H3644>as<s%> a <S%H5067>heap.<s%>
In the <S%H3119>daytime<s%> also he <S%H5148>led<s%> them with a <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3915>night<s%> with a <S%H216>light<s%> of <S%H784>fire.<s%>
He <S%H1234>cleaved<s%> the <S%H6697>rocks<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and gave them <S%H8248>drink<s%> as out of the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H8415>depths.<s%>
He brought streams also <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H5140><s%> of the <S%H4480>rock,<s%> <S%H5553><s%> and caused <S%H4325>waters<s%> to run <S%H3381>down<s%> like <S%H5104>rivers.<s%>
And they <S%H2398>sinned<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> against him by <S%H4784>provoking<s%> the most <S%H5945>High<s%> in the <S%H6723>wilderness.<s%>
And they <S%H5254>tempted<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> in their <S%H3824>heart<s%> by <S%H7592>asking<s%> <S%H400>meat<s%> for their <S%H5315>lust.<s%>
Yea, they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> against <S%H430>God;<s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3201>Can<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H6186>furnish<s%> a <S%H7979>table<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness?<s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> he <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H6697>rock,<s%> that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> gushed <S%H2100>out,<s%> and the <S%H5158>streams<s%> <S%H7857>overflowed;<s%> <S%H3201>can<s%> he <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H1571>also?<s%> can he <S%H3559>provide<s%> <S%H7607>flesh<s%> for his <S%H5971>people?<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> this, and was <S%H5674>wroth:<s%> so a <S%H784>fire<s%> was <S%H5400>kindled<s%> against <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H539>believed<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H982>trusted<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in his salvation: <S%H3444><s%>
Though he had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H7834>clouds<s%> from <S%H4480>above,<s%> <S%H4605><s%> and <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%>
And had rained <S%H4305>down<s%> <S%H4478>manna<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them to <S%H398>eat,<s%> and had <S%H5414>given<s%> them of the <S%H1715>corn<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
Man <S%H376><s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H47>angels'<s%> <S%H3899>food:<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> them <S%H6720>meat<s%> to the <S%H7648>full.<s%>
He caused an east <S%H6921>wind<s%> to <S%H5265>blow<s%> in the <S%H8064>heaven:<s%> and by his <S%H5797>power<s%> he <S%H5090>brought<s%> in the south <S%H8486>wind.<s%>
He <S%H4305>rained<s%> <S%H7607>flesh<s%> also <S%H5921>upon<s%> them as <S%H6083>dust,<s%> and <S%H3671>feathered<s%> <S%H5775>fowls<s%> like as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the sea: <S%H3220><s%>
And he let it <S%H5307>fall<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of their <S%H4264>camp,<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> their <S%H4908>habitations.<s%>
So they did <S%H398>eat,<s%> and were <S%H3966>well<s%> <S%H7646>filled:<s%> for he <S%H935>gave<s%> them their own <S%H8378>desire;<s%>
They were <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2114>estranged<s%> from their <S%H4480>lust.<s%> <S%H8378><s%> But while their <S%H400>meat<s%> was <S%H5750>yet<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouths,<s%>

The <S%H639>wrath<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> upon them, and <S%H2026>slew<s%> the <S%H4924>fattest<s%> of them, and smote <S%H3766>down<s%> the <S%H970>chosen<s%> men of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
For <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> they <S%H2398>sinned<s%> <S%H5750>still,<s%> and <S%H539>believed<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> for his wondrous <S%H6381>works.<s%>
Therefore their <S%H3117>days<s%> did he <S%H3615>consume<s%> in <S%H1892>vanity,<s%> and their <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H928>trouble.<s%>
When <S%H518><s%> he <S%H2026>slew<s%> them, then they <S%H1875>sought<s%> him: and they <S%H7725>returned<s%> and inquired <S%H7836>early<s%> after <S%H410>God.<s%>
And they <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> was their <S%H6697>rock,<s%> and the <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> their <S%H1350>redeemer.<s%>
Nevertheless they did <S%H6601>flatter<s%> him with their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and they <S%H3576>lied<s%> unto him with their <S%H3956>tongues.<s%>
For their <S%H3820>heart<s%> was not <S%H3808>right<s%> <S%H3559><s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him, <S%H3808>neither<s%> were they <S%H539>steadfast<s%> in his <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

But <S%H1931>he,<s%> being full of <S%H7349>compassion,<s%> <S%H3722>forgave<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> them <S%H3808>not:<s%> yea, <S%H7235>many<s%> a time turned he his anger <S%H639>away,<s%> <S%H7725><s%> and did <S%H3808>not<s%> stir <S%H5782>up<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2534>wrath.<s%>
For he <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> were but <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> a <S%H7307>wind<s%> that passeth <S%H1980>away,<s%> and cometh not <S%H3808>again.<s%> <S%H7725><s%>
How <S%H4100>oft<s%> did they <S%H4784>provoke<s%> him in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H6087>grieve<s%> him in the <S%H3452>desert!<s%>
Yea, they turned <S%H7725>back<s%> and <S%H5254>tempted<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> and <S%H8428>limited<s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
They <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> nor the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> he <S%H6299>delivered<s%> them <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H6862>enemy.<s%>
How <S%H834><s%> he had <S%H7760>wrought<s%> his <S%H226>signs<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and his <S%H4159>wonders<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of Zoan: <S%H6814><s%>
And had <S%H2015>turned<s%> their <S%H2975>rivers<s%> into <S%H1818>blood;<s%> and their <S%H5140>floods,<s%> that they could <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H8354>drink.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> divers sorts of <S%H6157>flies<s%> among them, which <S%H398>devoured<s%> them; and <S%H6854>frogs,<s%> which <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> them.
He <S%H5414>gave<s%> also their <S%H2981>increase<s%> unto the <S%H2625>caterpillar,<s%> and their <S%H3018>labor<s%> unto the <S%H697>locust.<s%>
He <S%H2026>destroyed<s%> their <S%H1612>vines<s%> with <S%H1259>hail,<s%> and their sycamore <S%H8256>trees<s%> with <S%H2602>frost.<s%>
He gave <S%H5462>up<s%> their <S%H1165>cattle<s%> also to the <S%H1259>hail,<s%> and their <S%H4735>flocks<s%> to hot <S%H7565>thunderbolts.<s%>

He <S%H7971>cast<s%> upon them the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of his <S%H639>anger,<s%> <S%H5678>wrath,<s%> and <S%H2195>indignation,<s%> and <S%H6869>trouble,<s%> by <S%H4917>sending<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4397>angels<s%> among them.

He <S%H6424>made<s%> a <S%H5410>way<s%> to his <S%H639>anger;<s%> he <S%H2820>spared<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> their <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H4480>death,<s%> <S%H4194><s%> but <S%H5462>gave<s%> their <S%H2416>life<s%> over to the <S%H1698>pestilence;<s%>
And <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> the <S%H7225>chief<s%> of their <S%H202>strength<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacles<s%> of Ham: <S%H2526><s%>
But made his own <S%H5971>people<s%> to go <S%H5265>forth<s%> like <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and <S%H5090>guided<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> like a <S%H5739>flock.<s%>
And he <S%H5148>led<s%> them on <S%H983>safely,<s%> so that they <S%H6342>feared<s%> <S%H3808>not:<s%> but the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H3680>overwhelmed<s%> their <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> them <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of his <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> even to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> which his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> had <S%H7069>purchased.<s%>

He cast <S%H1644>out<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> also <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them, and <S%H5307>divided<s%> them an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> by <S%H2256>line,<s%> and made the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in their <S%H168>tents.<s%>
Yet they <S%H5254>tempted<s%> and <S%H4784>provoked<s%> <S%H853><s%> the most <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> his testimonies: <S%H5713><s%>
But turned <S%H5472>back,<s%> and dealt <S%H898>unfaithfully<s%> like their <S%H1>fathers:<s%> they were turned <S%H2015>aside<s%> like a <S%H7423>deceitful<s%> <S%H7198>bow.<s%>
For they provoked him to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with their high <S%H1116>places,<s%> and moved him to <S%H7065>jealousy<s%> with their graven <S%H6456>images.<s%>
When <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> this, he was <S%H5674>wroth,<s%> and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3988>abhorred<s%> Israel: <S%H3478><s%>
So that he <S%H5203>forsook<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> which he <S%H7931>placed<s%> among <S%H120>men;<s%>
And <S%H5414>delivered<s%> his <S%H5797>strength<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity,<s%> and his <S%H8597>glory<s%> into the <S%H6862>enemy's<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
He <S%H5462>gave<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5462>over<s%> also unto the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and was <S%H5674>wroth<s%> with his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
The <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>consumed<s%> their young <S%H970>men;<s%> and their <S%H1330>maidens<s%> were <S%H3808>not<s%> given to <S%H1984>marriage.<s%>
Their <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and their <S%H490>widows<s%> made <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1058>lamentation.<s%>
Then the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3364>awaked<s%> as one out of <S%H3463>sleep,<s%> and like a mighty <S%H1368>man<s%> that <S%H7442>shouteth<s%> by reason of <S%H4480>wine.<s%> <S%H3196><s%>
And he <S%H5221>smote<s%> his <S%H6862>enemies<s%> in the hinder <S%H268>parts:<s%> he <S%H5414>put<s%> them to a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>
Moreover he <S%H3988>refused<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of Ephraim: <S%H669><s%>
But <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H157>loved.<s%>
And he <S%H1129>built<s%> his <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> <S%H7311>high<s%> palaces, like the <S%H776>earth<s%> which he hath <S%H3245>established<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
He <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> also his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> him from the <S%H4480>sheepfolds:<s%> <S%H4356><s%> <S%H6629><s%>

From <S%H4480>following<s%> <S%H310><s%> the ewes great with <S%H5763>young<s%> he <S%H935>brought<s%> him to <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
So he <S%H7462>fed<s%> them according to the <S%H8537>integrity<s%> of his <S%H3824>heart;<s%> and <S%H5148>guided<s%> them by the <S%H8394>skilfulness<s%> of his <S%H3709>hands.<s%>
